name: MYSTERY NEIGHBOR BATTLEGROUND
description:
MULTIPLAYER MYSTERY HORROR ADVENTURE.

Discover the terrible little secrets of the suburban neighborhood. Choose a character, weapon, create a room or join an existing one and start fighting! Your first task to land after you jump out of the plane. Do not worry, the parachute will automatically open. Find your opponents, shoot them one by one and win the battle.



Features:
-Multiplayer
-Character and weapon selection
-Funny cartoonish effects
-Sound effects
